mapper.select: select bno,userid,title,content,regdate,updatedate,reply_count,category,like_count,unlike_count,substring_index(location,'_',-1) as location,view_count,nickname from tbl_board where (location LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gu},'%')) order by bno desc limit #{startIndex}, #{amount}

order by bno desc limit #{startIndex}, #{amount}

mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (userid,nickname, title, content, regdate, category, location ) values (#{userid},#{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate(), #{category}, #{location})
